Name: Angry Angry Shark
About the game: Angry Angry shark is a fast pace shooter game where players aim to reach the highest rounds by killing as mush sharks as possible. You can play solo or with a group of 3 other friends as you fight against endless waves of man eating sharks. Solo mode Multiplayer Team Deathmatch Search and Destroy Deathmatch Sharks Weapon & Character Customization Leaderboards Friends List
